lexUnit.name: finger.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: each of the four slender jointed parts attached to either hand (or five, if the thumb is included).

sentence.text: I usually put one piece on the index finger of the left hand and the other piece on the second finger of the right hand .
The fingers of her right hand clutched tightly at her pencil ; those of her left hand were crossed , firmly , desperately .
A Malaysian was jailed for five years for biting off the finger of a policeman who stopped him from stealing a motorcycle .
She ticks them off , one by one , on her long slender fingers .
He took a huge gulp of cognac , raised his finger to order another round , and settled his bulk as comfortably as he could into his chair before resuming the conversation .
She blushed furiously , then moaned as his finger found the centre of one breast and a million sparks flew to every corner of her body .
I followed his pointed finger and saw the plane , not very high above the horizon .
` You ca n't force me , " she whispered , protecting her nakedness with her hands , each breast splayed in a plump cushion around her spread fingers .
And then those nimble , caring fingers began to fondle her breasts ; covering the soft malleable globes with a thin coating of the erotically perfumed oil .
She reached out and stroked the cat 's rump , her plump , tapering fingers sinking into the fur .
But as her trembling fingers closed around it , a more satisfying notion flew into her head .
The Brownie Guider put her fingers in her ears , and at last the Brownies stopped talking all together .
Bobo touched her crooked finger to her lips and then lowered her hand , palm upwards .
She swallowed convulsively , and tightened the belt of her Burberry , turning up the collar as if she was preparing to weather a blizzard before closing numb fingers round the hand-grip of her bag .
Luke gripped her shoulder , digging his fingers in so hard she winced with pain .
Ricky put a hand over Daisy 's , a large rough hand with callouses beneath the base of each long finger from endlessly holding a polo stick .
By the time she wound the scarlet sash around her waist once more , miniaturized digital weapons hooded her fingers like so many baroque thimbles .
She welcomed him into bed , pressing herself tight against him , running her fingers through is great leonine mane and sending him signals to say that she was ready to do her duty as a wife .
He fumbled in the pocket of his jacket with stiff frozen fingers .
Starke looked at the finger , so he withdrew it when he remembered how dirty his fingernails were .
She has some movement in her fingers .
He squatted , then lay down , he edged and wriggled along and had his fingers round those curved shallow indentations when the train started .
One woman had her finger cut off in a slicing machine and never received any compensation .
He had a strand of her hair in his fingers ; he played with it , twisting it round until it curled .
As mentioned , IBM has opted for the mouse stick in the middle of the keyboard instead of the little trackball or the little panel you diddle with your finger .
I tell you , sir , I couldn 't move a finger , nor get my breath , till it whisked away and was gone .
